name: Spider Simulator
description:
This is a pretty rough game, gotta be honest. I was going to make a proper horror game, but around 5 days into the week-long game jam, I started modelling the monster and realised, I couldn't possibly make anything scary with my modelling skills...

So I did what anyone with about 1 day left of a week-long game jam would do... I started again. My friend talked about a game where you're a spider, so I went with that, and this is the result.

It's a little buggy, but it works fine. Could definitely use more polish - but oh well it is what it is.

Basically, you walk around a pumpkin and pick up sweets as a spider, you have 1 minute to collect as many as you can.
